prod.path: Home/Sneakers/Air Jordan/1/High/Jordan 1 Retro High Shattered Backboard 3.0
prod.desciption:
Jordan Brand adds to its Shattered Backboard lineage with the Jordan 1 Retro High Shattered Backboard 3.0, now available on StockX. This colorway was inspired by the orange and black jersey that Michael wore when he shattered a backboard in an Italian exhibition game in 1986.
This newest installment in the SBB series differs from the previous three in material. The design is comprised of a black and orange crinkled patent leather upper to represent the shattered glass. A yellowed vanilla mid and outsole complete the design. These sneakers released in October of 2019 and retailed for $160.
